name: ocl.js
description: Object Constraint Language parser written in JavaScript.

scripts.build:examples: npm run build && npm run webpack -- --config webpack.examples.config.js
scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && npm run generate:parser && npm run webpack -- --config webpack.config.js --progress --profile --bail
scripts.clean: npm cache verify && npm run rimraf -- node_modules dist lib
scripts.test: npm run generate:parser && node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test:coverage: npm run generate:parser && babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- test/**/*.spec.js

author: Stephan KÃ¶ninger <ocl.js@stekoe.de>
